title: QA Worktree Bash Environment Non-Functional
issue: All bash commands in the QA worktree for TKT-089-V2 are failing with exit code 1. Cannot execute ANY commands including pwd, ls, pnpm, curl.
impact: BLOCKING - QA agent cannot perform ANY testing: no build verification, no dev server, no tests
possible_causes: Worktree not properly initialized by launcher script
pnpm install never run during setup
File permissions issue in worktree directory
Bash shell environment issue specific to this worktree
human_actions_required: 1. Check if worktree directory exists and has correct permissions
2. Try running commands manually in that worktree directory
3. Check for any error logs from worktree creation
4. If unfixable, delete and recreate worktree:
